citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:52 PM on
03/13/2024. Upon arrival the perimeter fence was closed and there was no access to the facility. The inspector called the
number provided and left a voice message. The inspector left an attempted inspection flier and business card attached to
the fence. After waiting 30 minutes the inspector left the property. The Licensee call back the inspector and apologized.
Inspector and licensee discussed optimal hours and attempted inspection process.
End Section

narrative:
2.126 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:52 PM on 
03/13/2024. Upon arrival the perimeter fence was closed and there was no access to the facility. The inspector called the 
number provided and left a voice message. The inspector left an attempted inspection flier and business card attached to 
the fence. After waiting 30 minutes the inspector left the property. The Licensee call back the inspector and apologized. 
Inspector and licensee discussed optimal hours and attempted inspection process. 
 
 
End Section
